entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
